question: Most of the people in the society enjoy watching crime movies and criminal TV programs. Why do you think people have more interest to watch them? What is the impact to the society due to this?
text: There will be so many crime movies and criminal television shows are released every year. Because, many of the people like this stream and make the films hit. In my opinion, only few people influenced by the cinema. I am going to discuss about this in detail in the below section.

First, the most popular and revenue generated genre is crime. Trends are showing that the highest number of movies and TV shows, releasing was related to crime. Because audience more fascinated about these kind of films. For instance, Breaking Bad TV show was a fabulous hit on the small screen. This show was released in the year of 2000. Since then, people have been watching continuously across the world. There were many other cinemas and TV shows are being streamed and became successful.

Second, there are many pros and cons in regards to these types of shows. Since many of the shows are being filmed in this type of genre every year, it will generate enormous revenue. More revenue means more employment. Many families are receiving bread and butter, due to these kind of shows. In addition to this, people are also getting entertainment. Other side, few teenagers are affected by crime shows and breaching the law, however this impact was minimal.

To conclude, every kind of movies and shows are having a positive and negative side. It is all depending on the humans. People ought to consider movies and shows are only entertainment purpose and not for any illegal activities.
